values:
I've lived a long life and I've done many things, some I am proud of and many I am not. I've started a new venture into the world of a modern day christian. Though somewhat difficult for someone of my nature I am finding it rewarding I have already been offered a place to stay within the church and I've accepted. This is a very trying task for me but I shall endure if not for myself then for Eva I can only hope that others will understand and respect my desicion though any disagreements will hold no bearing on the future I have chosen for myself.

Now that the formalities are through let me be frank in saying that I've accepted a hell on earth so that I may dwell in a place that will probably be far worse than this all in the hopes of seeing Eva once more. I  "pray" that  I will be successful in my goal because if not someone be it in heaven or hell will have much to answer for.

That is all good night and .....god....bless...you.

I have nearly served the sentence that was set by the dark lord so that once more I can shed this corrupted skin and become the man that I once was, that is if I am able. I have shed much blood and though it is my great shame to admit it to my core I enjoyed it. For centruries I have denied myself the pleasures that a demon of my age and status would enjoy, but now....

Eva help me, I do not know what will become of me.

I've been to hell and back many times, I have seen the faces of countless evils yet nothing has pierced my heart more then the words my sons have spoken to me. I suppose that is to be expected when you make such a grave decison. I find myself once more trying to do what is right and still shedding blood and destroying whats left of an already torn family. I now wish that I could just ignore the emotions I worked so hard to develop for now I am drowning in them and left a ragdoll of shame.

I've been away for quite some time, I had many questions I needed to ask myself many inner conflicts that had to be worked out in solitude. I apologize for my disapperance, it was inconsiderate of me but I am sure things have been going smoothly in my absence. I will be returning in one weeks time, do not try and find me I am sure that your search will be in vain.

Fate it seems is not without a sence of humor. In the time span of a few weeks I have been given a great gift and a great burden. My son has finally allowed himself to open up to his human emotions (though I am sure he is doing so reluctantly) and has allowed himself to grow close to another, besides his family. There is no way to measure how proud I am of him This impresses me far more than any demonic ability ever could Dante is also becoming more open, he recently explained his logic on why he is so bitter towards me, and while I may not agree with his decision I shall respect it.

I must remember to have a few words with one Cloud Strife. His recent actions have concerned me and I find myself often wondering what will become of him. If he ever does manage to truly end himself I must remember to pay him a visit in the underworld, death will not end my interest in him. I'm sure he is fine now though he did have Dante to guide him. I just don't understand why Dante insist on portraying someone irresponicible when it is clear how mature he is

I had another brief encounter with General Sephiroth, I must say he is a very interesting individual. Always a pleasure to speak with a young warrior such as him.

I suppse it was a blessing Kaiba broke my last laptop this one is so much easier to use.

Demons have been running amok in New Sanctum, as much as I had to admit it, I am happy to see these events come to pass. Mundus' plans are finally in action, so soon he will come out of hiding and I will have the chance to once again banish him into the neitherworld where he belongs.

The demonic blood the runs through my veins is screaming for his blood, this battle I feel is mine and mine alone. Though I have gathered many allies who want nothing more than to aid me in slaying the dark lord, the closer I get to finally meeting him in combat the more my blood screams that this is my kill and my kill alone. This blood lust is maddening.

I have given my word to Vergil that the one who will slay the Dark Lord will be him. I believe this to be the hardest promise I will ever have to keep. I do not wish to see anyone face Mundus except for me, I do not wish for him to lay on finger on my son's, I do not wish for him to have the chance to kill anyone I love.

I have to admit, the closer I get to Mundus the more my demonic blood pulses, all of the old familiar urges that I have surpressed come to the surface. I rather enjoy the feeling.

When you die Mundus I want you to look into they eyes of the men who killed you.
They will be the sons of Sparda.

He has returned, Mundus. He again comes to claim everything that I care for. I feel that in the matter of destroying him I will not be as useful as expected, not due to a lack of ability but a lack of control. Mundus brings out in me what I have strived so hard to conceal. I am a devil, a pure devil with no soul it is a fact that haunts me to this very day but one I have learned to live with. Mundus attacked Vergil my eldest son, Dante the embodiment of Eva, and Yuna a young mortal girl who has managed to fit in with a family of demons. For that I would love nothing more then to slowly torture Mundus into submisson, but it seems that my way of handling the situation (not neccessarily my way by choice but by nature) does not fit the ideas of those mentioned earlier. So I find myself at a bit of a crossroad, I could attempt to kill Mundus myself and save them from having to encounter such a battle, and lose what humanity I have and possibly my life. Or I can wait for Mundus to attack them when he see's fit with the chance of one of those I care about meeting a tragic end.

I long to see Mundus again in combat, I will make him pay dearly for what he has done to my family. I will be there this time Dante I will be there when you need me. I will not let you down again. Vergil I will be the man you have looked up to.
I am the Legendary Dark Knight Sparda
And I will kill Mundus again.


For you Eva.
Everything is for you.

Mortals never seize to amaze me, they are quite frankly the perfect combination of courage and foolishness. I have just aquired to mortal students a one Cloud Strife and Kaiba Seto.


Let me begin by my evaluation of Cloud.
I believe that this young man does in fact have the potential to be a great ally in the fight against Mundus. Any mortal who can stand weapon in hand to Vergil (no matter what his condition) is a mortal with the potential to do great things, with that said let me also state that he has the potential, however I am not sure of his will to use said potential. I have not had much chance to talk to him but in the moments that I did have it was clear to see that he was rather distracted. Not to mention I remain unclear in this young man's motives to join us, he says its for Yuna and that much is clear but I fear his pride may play a part in his decision. I also fear that he does not realize what it is he is getting himself into. If he takes our training lightly he will die, if he takes demons lightly he will die. I still remain hopeful for Mr. Strife.

On to Mister Kaiba Seto
 In all my long life I do not believe anyone has ever made such a bad first impression on me then Mr. Seto. He is a rude, inconsiderate, and ill mannered twit to which an equal has yet to grace the earth, but alas the boy is as clever as they come. With his sharp attitude comes a sharp mind that if molded correctly could benefit all of mankind. I have assigned him to after school tutoring sessions with me to do just that sharpen his mind, soften his attitude, give him all the things that a just ruler would ever need. I have no intentions on putting anyone on a thrown at least not anymore but I have the feeling that he will find his own place among men on his own, and it would be best to shape him before that happened.
Those will be my two finest (mortal) students.
As for my finest student.


I would have to examine Vergil.
My son and I have been constantly training and with each session his powers seem to increase a hundred fold. He has already conquered me in terms of speed, and we are an even match when it comes to basic swordsmen ship. What he now lacks is mastery over his Devil, though this will take time to train this weakness can be overcome.

Now if only I could get Dante to train.....

I saw them. After more than a century I have seen my boys again, and I couldn't be prouder of them. Vergil has grown to be quite the honourable warrior (Reminds me so much of the samruri warriors I spent years living with). Dante well...I have to spend more time with him. He blames me for Eves death. I love him so much, but it seems the feelings are very far from mutual. I must say I did expect this to happen in due time maybe I can make him see. Yes that is a nice thought we can once more be a family.  Vergil has informed me of the tyranny ruling this world. When will these humans learn, never perhaps. Apparently they are targeting "Mutants" creatures displaying abilities beyond human capabilities. Its only a matter of time before they find me and my boys (Especially with my shadow that does tend to draw unwanted attention ^^)

Dante I wish I could show you that I would give anything I have to have been able to save your mother. She was a strong woman far stronger than any demon I have ever faced, it was her spirit that made her so strong. I was new to this world when she excepted me, a lost soul. You mother was fond of picking weapons for me to use on my missions. (She said Sparda was a hideous looking "Thing") I must admit all the weapons she choose were as effective as they were beautiful from Yamato to Rebellion all beautiful. I did what was to be done when I left Eve was well aware of the risk she understood mundus could not be allowed to return.

For you Eve I will protect our boys. For you I will protect these mortals
.
Legendary Dark Knight Sparda

Its been so long, I think I may have found them. All roads let to a shop, "Devil May Cry". They have to be there. I've been searching for them every second of every day since I've gotten back from that island. What will I say to them...what do they think of me. If only I would have told them what I had to do that night oh god maybe I could have saved Eve. There is still so much I don't know. I must also mention that I am finding it quite comforting that I haven't run into any demons. I thought Mundus would of had this place crawling with them by now. Have the humans finally found a way to defend themselves....or..could it be..my boys.



Dark Knight Sparda
